data.name: ConnectionToTheSpecifiedEpistleServerFailed
data.value: The connection to the specified Epistle server could not be established.
data.comment: The connection to the specified Epistle server could not be established.

data.name: ConvoCreationFailedServerSide
data.value: Convo "{0}" couldn't be created. Perhaps due to unsuccessful Two-Factor Authentication: please double check the provided 2FA token and try again.
data.comment: Convo "{0}" couldn't be created. Perhaps due to unsuccessful Two-Factor Authentication: please double check the provided 2FA token and try again.

data.name: ConvoCreationPasswordsDontMatch
data.value: The password does not match its confirmation; please make sure that you re-type your password correctly!
data.comment: The password does not match its confirmation; please make sure that you re-type your password correctly!

data.name: ConvoCreationPasswordTooWeak
data.value: Your password is too weak; make sure that it has at least more than 5 characters!
data.comment: Your password is too weak; make sure that it has at least more than 5 characters!

data.name: CouldNotConnectToServerErrorMessageUserCreationViewModel
data.value: Could not connect to the Epistle server. Please make sure to have a working, active internet connection and double check the server URL!
data.comment: Could not connect to the Epistle server. Please make sure to have a working, active internet connection and double check the server URL!

data.name: CouldNotJoinConvoPleaseDoubleCheckCredentials
data.value: Couldn't join convo. Please double check the credentials and try again. If that's not the problem, then the convo might have expired, deleted or you've been kicked out of it. Sorry :/
data.comment: Couldn't join convo. Please double check the credentials and try again. If that's not the problem, then the convo might have expired, deleted or you've been kicked out of it. Sorry :/

data.value: Download attachment
data.comment: Download attachment

data.comment: Epistle Message Attachment|*{0}

data.name: EpistleServerUnresponsive
data.value: Epistle Server Unresponsive
data.comment: Epistle Server Unresponsive

data.name: EpistleServerUnresponsiveErrorMessage
data.value: ERROR: The Glitched Epistle server is unresponsive. It might be under maintenance, please try again later! Sorry.
data.comment: ERROR: The Glitched Epistle server is unresponsive. It might be under maintenance, please try again later! Sorry.

data.name: ERROR
data.value: ERROR
data.comment: ERROR

data.name: FileCouldNotBeUploaded
data.value: ERROR: Your file couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API
data.comment: ERROR: Your file couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API

data.name: FileCouldNotBeUploadedBecauseItExceedsMaxFileSizeLimit
data.value: ERROR: Your file couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API because it exceeds the maximum file size limit.
data.comment: ERROR: Your file couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API because it exceeds the maximum file size limit.

data.name: GlitchedEpistleAlreadyRunningErrorMessage
data.value: There is already one instance of Glitched Epistle running!
data.comment: There is already one instance of Glitched Epistle running!

data.name: Information
data.value: Information
data.comment: Information

data.name: InvalidUserIdPasswordOr2FA
data.value: ERROR: Invalid user id, password or two-factor authentication token.
data.comment: ERROR: Invalid user id, password or two-factor authentication token.

data.name: InvalidUserIdPasswordOr2FA_Detailed
data.value: Note that if your credentials are correct but login fails nonetheless, it might be that you're locked out due to too many failed attempts! Please try again in 15 minutes.
data.comment: Note that if your credentials are correct but login fails nonetheless, it might be that you're locked out due to too many failed attempts! Please try again in 15 minutes.

data.name: LoginSucceededServerSideButResponseCouldNotBeHandledClientSide
data.value: Unexpected ERROR! Login succeeded server-side, but the returned response couldn't be handled properly (probably key decryption failure).
data.comment: Unexpected ERROR! Login succeeded server-side, but the returned response couldn't be handled properly (probably key decryption failure).

data.name: MessageUploadFailed
data.value: Message upload failed
data.comment: Message upload failed

data.name: NoTwoFactorAuthTokenProvided
data.value: No Two-Factor Authentication token provided. Please authenticate your request!
data.comment: No Two-Factor Authentication token provided. Please authenticate your request!

data.name: Okay
data.value: Okay
data.comment: Okay

data.name: OldPasswordWrongOrNewOnesDontMatch
data.value: The old password is wrong or the new ones don't match.
data.comment: The old password is wrong or the new ones don't match.

data.name: PasswordChangedSuccessfully
data.value: Congrats! Your password has been changed successfully.
data.comment: Congrats! Your password has been changed successfully.

data.name: PasswordChangeRejectedServerSide
data.value: Password change request rejected server-side: perhaps invalid, expired or already used 2FA token?
data.comment: Password change request rejected server-side: perhaps invalid, expired or already used 2FA token?

data.name: PasswordsDontMatch
data.value: The entered passwords don't match.
data.comment: The entered passwords don't match.

data.name: PasswordTooWeakErrorMessage
data.value: Your password is too weak; make sure that it has at least more than 7 characters!
data.comment: Your password is too weak; make sure that it has at least more than 7 characters!

data.name: PleaseDefineUsernameDialogText
data.value:
Don't worry, you can change this later in the settings.
Your username is used for sending messages.
If you change your username, messages that were sent using your old username will NOT be updated retroactively!
It is stored locally on a per-machine basis, meaning that you can have multiple usernames across devices (e.g. one for when you send from your phone or laptop, etc...).
data.comment:
Don't worry, you can change this later in the settings.
Your username is used for sending messages.
If you change your username, messages that were sent using your old username will NOT be updated retroactively!
It is stored locally on a per-machine basis, meaning that you can have multiple usernames across devices (e.g. one for when you send from your phone or laptop, etc...).

data.name: PleaseDefineUsernameDialogTitle
data.value: Please define a username
data.comment: Please define a username

data.comment: Epistle - Select the file you want to send

data.comment: ERROR: Your text message couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API

data.name: TwoFactorAuthFailed
data.value: Two-Factor Authentication failed!
data.comment: Two-Factor Authentication failed!

data.name: UnexpectedErrorWhileGeneratingRSAKeyPair
data.value: An unexpected and unknown error occurred whilst generating the RSA key pair.
data.comment: An unexpected and unknown error occurred whilst generating the RSA key pair.

data.name: UserCreationFailedClientSide
data.value: The user creation succeeded server-side but there was an unexpected error whilst handling the user creation's server response client-side.
data.comment: The user creation succeeded server-side but there was an unexpected error whilst handling the user creation's server response client-side.

data.name: UserCreationFailedServerSide
data.value: The user creation process failed server-side. Please double check the server URL and make sure that the user creation secret is correct!
data.comment: The user creation process failed server-side. Please double check the server URL and make sure that the user creation secret is correct!
